title: small bug in torchvision.datasets.ImageFolder
body_html:
This is not a huge bug, but it is kinda a bug.
In linux sometimes the names are like img.JPEG instead of img.jpeg, and apparently torchvision.datasets.ImageFolder is not happy with that and throw an error that it just likes the jpeg not JPEG.
If you guys can consider that that would be nice.
Thanks

body:
This is not a huge bug, but it is kinda a bug.
In linux sometimes the names are like img.JPEG instead of img.jpeg, and apparently `torchvision.datasets.ImageFolder` is not happy with that and throw an error that it just likes the jpeg not JPEG.
If you guys can consider that that would be nice.
Thanks
